subsection.name: Description

ul.li: There is one blank line between each of two paragraphs.

Each paragraph but the first has

immediately before the first word, with no space after.
First paragraph tag should not precede HTML block-tag, nested paragraph tags are allowed to do that.

subsection.p: The Check ignores all the nested paragraph tags, it will not give any kind of violation if the paragraph tag is nested.

tr.td:
Control whether the

tag should be placed immediately before the first word.
Control when to print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check violates the tight html rules defined at Tight-HTML Rules.
